events.message: I just received the blender I ordered, but it arrived with a cracked jug and it isn't working properly.
The reported problem involves a broken part and faulty operation, classifying it under Product Defect.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in product issues for further assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the cracked jug in your blender delivery. I'm here to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please send us photos of the cracked jug and confirm if the blender powers on despite the damage?
I have attached the photos showing the crack clearly. The blender does turn on but it leaks water, making it unusable.
Thank you for the photos. We will send you a replacement blender immediately at no extra cost and arrange for the damaged one to be collected.
Thanks for the prompt response and replacement offer. I appreciate the quick resolution and will await the new blender.
The replacement order has been processed, and we consider your issue resolved. Please contact us if you need any further help.
Just checking in to confirm that the replacement blender has arrived and everything is working as expected.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and works perfectly. Thank you for the excellent support throughout this process.
We have sent you a brief survey to gather feedback about your support experience. Your input is highly appreciated.
I completed the survey and rated the support as excellent. Thanks again for resolving my problem so efficiently.
Your support case has now been formally closed. Feel free to reach out if you experience any further issues.
This customer support case has been archived in our system after resolution and closure as per standard procedure.
